meanings.definition: To give (money or goods) for a charitable purpose.
meanings.sent1: I donate toys to the children's hospital every year.
meanings.sent2: She decided to donate some clothes to the homeless shelter.
meanings.sent3: The kind lady chose to donate her old books to the library.
meanings.sent4: His generosity seemed to donate warmth to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The act of donate can bring joy to both the giver and the receiver.

meanings.definition: To contribute (something) to a cause or organization.
meanings.sent1: We all donate a little money to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: Many people donate blood regularly to save lives.
meanings.sent3: The community decided to donate time to clean up the park.
meanings.sent4: Her efforts seemed to donate energy to the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The act of donate can create a ripple effect of positivity.

meanings.sent1: They donate food to the local food bank every month.
meanings.sent2: He promised to donate a portion of his earnings to charity.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to donate its affection to the new family member.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays donate warmth to the earth every day.
meanings.sent5: The act of donate can truly make a difference in someone's life.
